definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: The straw mattress needs to be aired.
A group of about 30 women are sitting on a large jute mat.
sentences.chinese: 大約三十個已婚婦女坐在一塊巨大的麻草墊上。

sentences.english: We shook down a straw mattress as an improvised bed.
sentences.chinese: 我們在地上攤開一條草墊作爲臨時牀鋪。

sentences.english: The hallway smelt of boiled cabbage and old rag mats.
sentences.chinese: 門廳裏一股子清煮白菜外帶破草墊的味兒。

sentences.english: What a beautiful marshland with lots of blooming wild flowers. It is worthy to climb.
sentences.chinese: 終於到了，多麼美麗的一個開滿鮮花的大草墊啊。
